Docs.summary: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> control redistributes space between rows or between columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Space is redistributed based on the values of the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, and P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True properties of the T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
- If the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is not set to F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, space is redistributed between columns.
- If the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is set to F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True and the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is not set to F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, space is redistributed between rows.
- If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between columns:
- The P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is set to F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- The P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is set to F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- The P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is less than or equal to the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between rows:
- P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is set to F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is set to F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is greater than the P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
